title: You`re Under Arrest Second Season
alternative_title: Taiho Shichau zo: Second Season, You're Under Arrest: Fast & Furious, 逮捕しちゃうぞ SECOND SEASON
description: Natsumi and Miyuki are policewomen at the Bokuto Police Station. This story recounts the exploits and adventures they have in dealing with the strange characters they are forced to deal with ‘all in a day’s work’.
